name: TankController
description:
Tank Controller CONTROLS:
  • Move with WASD
  • Aim with MOUSE
  • Shoot with LEFT CLICK 
  • Call airstrike with RIGHT CLICK (only in the advanced type tank)
HOW TO:
  • Select one of the three colors and the type of tank you want to try.
  • Shoot the red cube a.k.a enemy in the scene to make it disappear.
